## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getBaseUrl()](./rest.restclient.getbaseurl.md) |  | Returns the base url of RESTClient |
|  [getDefaultHeaders()](./rest.restclient.getdefaultheaders.md) |  | Returns the default headers of RESTClient in a key-value |
|  [requestInterceptor(req)](./rest.restclient.requestinterceptor.md) |  | Request interceptor for all methods, must return new HttpRequest since object is immutable |
|  [responseInterceptor(res)](./rest.restclient.responseinterceptor.md) |  | Allows to intercept all responses for all methods in class |
